ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Venril
ygData.msgSnippet: I can guarantee that lifetap is a poison resist check.  I ve tested this with a necro friend in duels.  If I sing Poison Resist songs he can t tap me worth a
ygData.messageBody:
I can guarantee that lifetap is a poison resist check. I've tested this
with a necro friend in duels. If I sing Poison Resist songs he can't tap me
worth a damn (it still hits but it hits for a TON less dmg) a 5pt dmg
lifetap does 0dmg the one that hits for like 200 only did like 20 dmg. So
the 2000 hp lifetap would probably be hitting for around 200 to 400 instead
of 2000 (quite the drastic difference, neh?)

Also, anyone that's taken on the Maestro of Rancor in Hate can tell you that
using Poison Resist songs reduces his AE Lifetap dmg from 3 to 4 bubbles
down to .5 to 1 bubble.

Lifetap is not a MR check, it's a Poison check, which is why it's so hard to
resist. Almost nobody worries about poison resist since 99.99% of all
poisons in the game do such pathetic dmg (thank god ;)

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath
----- Original Message -----
From: "Melaniel" <online.games@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 9:30 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Venril


> I also understood Lifetap was a poison resist type thing, but
> interested to hear more experienced people's opinions since I've never
> faced it in the field yet, phew!
>
> --
> Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (44)
> Ginnunga
> ... my first real guild, and it's got a silly name!
>
> Mith Marr server
>
> On Tue, 30 May 2000 05:54:26 -0700, you wrote:
>
> >I am pretty sure lifetap is pure magic resistance
> >Venril did no disease/posion dots. Just melee and that lifetap from what
i
> >can tell.
> >
> >Gendal Concorden, lvl 55 Bard of Talisman - Tuanre
> >Enoch Lyciferous, lvl 51 Necro
> >----- Original Message -----
> >From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>
> >To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> >Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 5:33 AM
> >Subject: Re: [eqbards] Venril
> >
> >
> >> If it's lifetap you need to have the bards sing "Purifying Rhytms" I
would
> >> also throw in Hymn and Nivs and the 50+ healing song as well. That
should
> >> help to counter the lifetap nicely. Alternately sing Purifying
Rhythms,
> >FCC
> >> and TCF. Also any poison resist spells your clerics/shaman/druids can
> >cast
> >> on you. Lifetap is a Poison Resist Check.
> >>
> >> Maestro of Rancor uses a Lifetap type spell that does nearly as much
dmg
> >> which is area affect and using poison resistance gear/songs/spells
people
> >> can usually take him down without too much trouble.
> >>
> >> Good luck!
> >>
> >> Lyrnia Jongleur
> >> Bard of Norrath
> >> <Travelers of Norrath>
